revised_title: Building Technology in the 1980s: Noise Reduction and Sound Insulation Strategies
tldr: This article discusses the importance of creating a proper noise climate in buildings, particularly in the 1980s. It highlights the need for better sound insulation and noise reduction strategies, focusing on indoor noise sources, outdoor noise sources, and building design. The author emphasizes the responsibility of building and planning authorities in ensuring a comfortable and healthy living environment.
